definition: to regard as/to view/to consider sth as/to treat as
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: The loss of the declaration or any alterations made on it may be considered breaking the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 凡遺失本單或申報單作塗改均被認作違法。

sentences.english: We insist on regarding them as they are aged and weak.
sentences.chinese: 自己們強行把他們認作是垂老地，弱勢地。

sentences.english: He always considered her as his real mother.
sentences.chinese: 他一向把她認作他的親孃。

sentences.english: Kindergarteners who could not read were even more likely to mistake medicine for candy.
sentences.chinese: 不會讀寫的幼兒園小朋友更容易將藥片認作糖果。

sentences.english: Doctors used to think of RBD as an isolated disorder.
sentences.chinese: 醫生一致把RBD認作是某種孤立的紊亂。

sentences.english: Athens, Ohio is one of the most haunted places in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 俄亥俄的雅典城被認作是美國最猛鬼的地方之一。
